EmailTemplate.name: Case Closed CA EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Case ID {!Case.Thread_Id} closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.FirstName},
We hope that all of your questions have been answered to your full satisfaction.
Your inquiry ID: {!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed, but you can always reply to this email if there is anything else we can do to assist you.
If you have any other questions or if you're looking for more information about DAZN, please visit our homepage at https://www.dazn.com/ and our help pages at https://my.dazn.com/help/CA-en, where you can find information and solutions to the most common problems.
Best regards, Your DAZN Team
Case Thread ID: {!Case.Thread_Id} Privacy Policy: https://my.dazn.com/help/ca-en/privacy Terms of Use: https://my.dazn.com/help/ca-en/terms
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
